text.section: Upon filing of the complaint or at any time prior to judgment, the plaintiff may apply pursuant to this chapter for an order of attachment by filing a written motion for the order with the court in which the action is brought.

The order of attachment shall be issued by the clerk upon compliance with KRS 425.301(3) unless the defendant has requested a hearing, in which case a hearing shall be conducted pursuant to KRS 425.031.

law.history: Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 399, sec. 1, effective June 17, 1978.
